articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: France’s Bayrou fights to stay prime minister - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Widely considered President Macron’s last hope, François Bayrou faces a key vote in parliament on Wednesday.
articles.content: Wednesdays vote in the National Assembly, the lower house of parliament, comes after Bayrou used a constitutional maneuver to enact parts of his 2025 spending plans without a vote. However, the measu… [+1485 chars]
